newsitem.title: GHANA: Ghana shares close little changed.
newsitem.headline: Ghana shares close little changed.

text.p: The Ghana Stock Exchange index closed little changed on Wednesday, despite gains by Enterprise Insurance (+6 cedis to 500 cedis), Mechanical Lloyd (+2 to 72) and Pioneer Tobacco (+3 to 208).
The Ghana All-Share index rose by a marginal 0.07 points to 367.87 from 367.80 on Monday.
A total of 76,910 shares were traded, with bids outstripping offers by 5,506,710 to 452,310.
The two declining issues were Paterson Zochonis (-4 to 245) and UTC Estates (-2 to 48).
